oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Girl being angry with her mother, because the latter asked her for a certain kind of food which she had put to roast in the fire, threw it with the wood-ashes that were upon it, into the air. The food was changed into stars, and the ashes became the Milky Way. By |han=kasso (L VIII.-10. 6879-6884). The Milky Way resembles the wood ash and the stars resemble the !huin roots in colour and shape. 1) p.6878v: |han=kass'o heard this story from his mother (|xabbi-an), 2) See also The girl who made the Milky Way, by throwing ashes into the sky, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-10.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The new maiden who threw !huin into the sky; which became stars, and the wood ashes which were upon it, the Milky Way
